message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product, which I'm confident will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, a steal considering its true value. It's a one-time opportunity to get your hands on a product that will bring you significant benefits. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'm not convinced by your enthusiasm, Alice. I'll pass on this one. Maybe next time you'll have a better offer.

In fact, I'm willing to provide you with a guarantee: if you buy this product and it doesn't meet your expectations, I'll personally make it right. I'll give you a full refund and throw in a second product of equal value. That's how confident I am in its quality. So, what do you say? Are you willing to take me up on this offer and experience the benefits for yourself?
Alice, your guarantee sounds nice, but I'm still not convinced. I'll pass on this one too.
